content: the piece row 11 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and in next 6st cid 21 7 row 12 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and legs make two in next 5st cid 21 6 you can crochet directly around the q-tip row 13 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and from the foot or insert it later but it can be in next 4st cid 21 5 di cid 30 cult if your magic_ring is tight row 14 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and start with orange yarn in next 3st cid 21 4 row 1 6sc in magic_ring cid 21 6 row 15 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and row 2-5 4 row 6sc cid 21 6 in next 2st cid 21 3 change to white yarn row 16 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and row 6 6sc cid 21 6 in next st cid 21 2 row 7 6inc cid 21 12 row 17 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook cid 21 1 row 8 12sc cid 21 12 single_crochet down the side and around the edge of row 9 single_crochet increase *6 cid 21 18 the piece stopping when there is 6 st left in row 10 turn 9sc cid 21 9 the round part of the piece before reach- 2 ing the part where you worked in row do this in the opposite direction for the second wing tail with black yarn row 1 ch5 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and in next 3st row 2 4sc down the other side of the chain 4sc in the cid 28 rst side cid 21 8 row 3 ch1 turn 2sc 4inc 2sc cid 21 12 row 4 ch1 turn 3sc increase single_crochet 2inc single_crochet increase 3sc cid 21 16 row 5 ch1 turn 3sc increase 2sc increase 2sc increase 2sc increase 3sc cid 21 20 finish o cid 27 leave a tail for sewing 3 assembly sew the beak to the head approx on 4 st wide 1 row above the white/black sepa- ration with yellow yarn surface crochet with slip_stitch along the orange/grey separation of the beak on each side then surface crochet with slip_stitch around the joint between beak and head to do surface crochet insert your hook in one of the stitch and poke it out in the stitch next to it make a slip knot and put it on your hook draw the slip knot out insert your hook in the stitch where you poked it out the cid 28 rst time and out in the stitch next to it yarn over and pull through stitches and the loop on your hook repeat there is a better tutorial with pictures on 53stitches com/picking-up-stitches except it s with single_crochet instead of slip_stitch sew wings to each side of the body the bottom of the wing should follow the black/white separation on the body i only attached the 12 front st of the
